text: The Mummy is a 1932 horror movie. It was directed by Karl Freund. It stars Boris Karloff as The Mummy, Zita Johann, David Manners, and Edward Van Sloan. The movie is about an Egyptian mummy that returns to life to stalk a woman who is the reincarnation of his lost love. ==Other websites== * * Category:1932 movies Category:1930s horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies set in Egypt Category:Movies about reincarnation Category:The Mummy Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Mummy (1932 movie)
